article.title: Combat Systems of the Future Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Advanced Systems/Supportability Engineering Technologies and Tools, Manassas, Virginia., is being awarded an $11,439,232 modification under a previously awarded contract to exercise options for Phase III Small Business Innovative Research topic number N05-149, "Combat System of the Future." These services will be rendered as needed to extend and apply previous efforts that focus on manning requirements, operator cognition, automation, data fusion, processing, technology evolution and combat system development applicable to Navy submarines, surface and air platforms. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
